info.title: nso-icon-tool
info.author: dslatt
info.description: Create custom avatars using NSO icons
info.details:
nso-icon-tool allows you create custom avatars using icon elements used by NSO. You can also your own images to create avatars if desired.

features:
access to an NSO icon element cache to create custom avatars
ability to update element cache to access new additions
use custom images when creating avatars

changelog:
0.4.5
Rebuilt for new libnx

0.4.4

Added zhHans translation in #27; thanks to @WE1ZARD
Fixed issue in ru translation file

0.4.3

Reworked code that handles downloading/extracting the icon zipfile (#24 )

0.4.2

This release adds the ability to use your own images when selecting icon components using the 'Frame', 'Character', or 'Background' sections. You can now use your own images and the NSO icon components together when creating your user icon.

Changes:

Added 'custom' entry to icon component listing that allows you to select your own images to use as icon parts
Did some rework on the code to remove a dependency and cleanup some mess
